Package org.corfudb.util.retry

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRetry<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,O,A extends IRetry>
    The IRetry interface is used to support implementing retry loops.
    IRetry.ExceptionHandler<T extends Exception,U extends Exception,V extends Exception,W extends Exception,X extends Exception,Z extends IRetry>
    This is a functional interface for handling exceptions.
    IRetry.ExceptionHandlerWithoutRetry<T extends Exception,U extends Exception,V extends Exception,W extends Exception,X extends Exception>
    This is a functional interface for handling exceptions.
    IRetryable<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,T>
    Created by mwei on 9/1/15.
    IStrictRetryable<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,T>
    Created by mwei on 9/1/15.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExponentialBackoffRetry<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,O,A extends IRetry>
    This class implements a basic exponential backoff retry.
    IntervalAndSentinelRetry<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,O>
    This class implements a basic interval-based retry, with sentinel.
    IntervalRetry<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,O>
    This class implements a basic interval-based retry.
    SentinelRetry<E extends Exception,F extends Exception,G extends Exception,H extends Exception,O>
    This class implements a sentinel based retry.
